modName: Revealing Lich Kings Armor - male - N-side edition
summary: Lite version of Lich King\'s Armor for males
descriptionHtml:
Revealing Lich Kings Armor

Lite version of Lich King\'s Armor for males



[img]http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/images/29200-1-1323630915.png[/img]




Requirements:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6348]Lich Kings Armor[/url] v0.991 or higher by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/545784]jojjo[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3421]Nude Male with Import from Roberts new vegas male[/url] v1.5 or higher by [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1630086]Sundracon[/url]



Note:
You have to install jojjo\'s Lich Kings Armor files first, then mine. If you don\'t overwrite all files, nothing will work.


Credits:
Bethesda Softworks
Nifskope
Blender
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/545784]jojjo[/url] for Lich Kings Armor meshes

Jen and 2pac4eva7 for [url=file.php?id=3790]Blender NIF Import - Export Tutorial[/url]
